remarks: An alternate definition of the biconditional for decidable propositions. Theorem *5.23 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 124, but with decidability conditions.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 5-May-2018.)
statement: dfbi3dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( ( ph <-> ps ) <-> ( ( ph /\ ps ) \/ ( -. ph /\ -. ps ) ) ) ) ) $.
